---
name: Story Template
about: This template is used to create new story and follow this docs when writing
  new story
title: "[STORY]"
labels: documentation, non technical
assignees: PRATIK-RAKTATE

---

### Title

[Docs]: What documentation needs improvement

### Summary

Describe what needs to be added, updated, or clarified.

### Current Gap

What is missing or confusing.

### Proposed Update

Explain the change or new content needed.

### Target Audience

- [ ]  New developers
- [ ]  Experienced engineers
- [ ]  End users
- [ ]  Operators

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ]  Content is accurate
- [ ]  Examples included
- [ ]  Links verified

### Additional Notes

References or related issues.
